channel.title: junko on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in junko on Barefoot Rob

item.title: blue car
item.description: 15:59 Sunday 21 October 2018 JST On my way to SOGO there was a blue car amongst the stalls where people were selling bread and beads and stuff. Huh. Old car looks new. It was old, and I asked the guy how old it was. Older than me by 2 years. After SOGO I talked to him (in English) for about 20 minutes, and met his daughter, who has an accupuncture place nearby.
